Html:
I'm evaluating KiGG  for sample web site and did some tests using wcat , but results aren't very impressive - about  8 req/sec
on not so young dual core test server .
What kind of performance should I expect from KiGG ?
Are there  any config settings to improve performance ?

Which page you are currently testing, With the Default setting Home page to first 5 page is cached and so is the upcoming and it should be served from the memory. I will do a Load test and publish the result.

I've tested one of the category pages without content .
It would be great if you could do some test so I could confront my results .
